line_1: His roofs of chrystal, and his glassy ailes;
line_2: NYMPHS! YOUR thin forms pervade his glittering piles,

line_1: Form the tall turrets, and the lengthen'd ailes;
line_2: Rocks rear'd on rocks in huge disjointed piles

line_1: Deep, in wide caverns and their shadowy ailes,
line_2: Daughter of Earth, the chaste TRUFFELIA smiles;

line_1: Round the dim walls, and through the whispering ailes
line_2: Hoarse breathes the wind, the glittering water boils.
